reviewText: One of my favorite movies of all time!  Have watched it several times.  Wish they would release a DVD as I would love to own one.

This has been one of my favorite movies since I was young.
I was glad to see it offered, even if it's on VHS.
I still have my DVD/VCR combo :)
Would love to see it offered on DVD for quality, which was OK for a tape.
A little tracking issue was all in one spot.  The rest was OK.
The movie is intriguing and nicely done.  If you like this type of movie then go for it, as it is not boring and will keep you guessing.
This movie was shown to me by a neighbor and its great it has a great storyline and a very sensual scene. Not sexual. It was a good movie

Having been to Thailand many times and being a Big Fan of Linda Purl, I was very pleased with the acting ,The story and the back drop of the "City of Angels" for this film. I only wish this film was available on DVD.
